item.description:
Hi All,

Let's climb then feast!

Please note: you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there. If you have never climbed before, you should take a class at Metrorock. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements to take the class. You can use the message board on this meetup to find other people that want to take the class. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. For more information see:

http://www.metrorock.....
http://maps.google.co....

The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.

When Metro nearly kicks us out @ 10 pm we go wine, whine and dine not too far from Everett.



Hope to see some of you there!

-Sandra

I'm not sure what I will be wearing, but I'm asian and have glasses...I'm sure you'll see me skulking about until 7:15 or there about.
item.name: c squared AT METRO ROCK (NOT BRG....)
